00020 
00021 //! A lightweight 2D container for abitrary objects
00022 //! (the objects must have a copy constructor)
00023 
00024 template<typename oT>
00025 class field
00026   {
00027   public:
00028   
00029   typedef oT object_type;
00030   
00031   const u32 n_rows;
00032   const u32 n_cols;  
00033   const u32 n_elem;
00034   
00035   
00036   private:
00037   
00038   u32  pad;
00039   oT** mem;       //!< pointer to memory used by the object
00040   oT*  mem_local[ 16 ];
00041   //!< Internal memory, allocated on the stack.
00042   //!< Designed to avoid calling the 'new' operator for small amounts of memory, resulting in considerable speedups.
00043   //!< Memory is allocated, via the 'new' operator, only if required.
00044   
00045   
00046   public:
00047   
00048   inline ~field();
00049   inline  field();
00050   
00051   inline                  field(const field& x);
00052   inline const field& operator=(const field& x);
00053   
00054   inline                  field(const subview_field<oT>& x);
00055   inline const field& operator=(const subview_field<oT>& x);
00056   
00057   inline explicit field(const u32 n_elem_in);
00058   inline          field(const u32 n_rows_in, const u32 n_cols_in);
00059   
00060   inline void set_size(const u32 n_obj_in);
00061   inline void set_size(const u32 n_rows_in, const u32 n_cols_in);
00062   
00063   inline       oT& operator[](const u32 i);
00064   inline const oT& operator[](const u32 i) const;
00065   
00066   inline       oT& operator()(const u32 i);
00067   inline const oT& operator()(const u32 i) const;
00068   
00069   inline       oT&         at(const u32 row, const u32 col);
00070   inline const oT&         at(const u32 row, const u32 col) const;
00071   
00072   inline       oT& operator()(const u32 row, const u32 col);
00073   inline const oT& operator()(const u32 row, const u32 col) const;
00074   
00075   inline       subview_field<oT> row(const u32 row_num);
00076   inline const subview_field<oT> row(const u32 row_num) const;
00077   
00078   inline       subview_field<oT> col(const u32 col_num);
00079   inline const subview_field<oT> col(const u32 col_num) const;
00080   
00081   inline       subview_field<oT> rows(const u32 in_row1, const u32 in_row2);
00082   inline const subview_field<oT> rows(const u32 in_row1, const u32 in_row2) const;
00083   
00084   inline       subview_field<oT> cols(const u32 in_col1, const u32 in_col2);
00085   inline const subview_field<oT> cols(const u32 in_col1, const u32 in_col2) const;
00086   
00087   inline       subview_field<oT> subfield(const u32 in_row1, const u32 in_col1, const u32 in_row2, const u32 in_col2);
00088   inline const subview_field<oT> subfield(const u32 in_row1, const u32 in_col1, const u32 in_row2, const u32 in_col2) const;
00089   
00090   inline void print(const std::string extra_text = "") const;
00091   
00092   inline void fill(const oT& x);
00093   
00094   inline void reset();
00095   inline void reset_objects();
00096   
00097   inline void save(const std::string name) const;
00098   inline void load(const std::string name);
00099   
00100   
00101   private:
00102   
00103   inline void init(const field<oT>& x);
00104   inline void init(const u32 n_rows_in, const u32 n_cols_in);
00105   
00106   inline void delete_objects();
00107   inline void create_objects();
00108   
00109   friend class field_aux;
00110   friend class subview_field<oT>;
00111   };
00112

00114 
00115 class field_aux
00116   {
00117   public:
00118   
00119   template<typename oT>

00121

00124   
00125   template<typename eT>
00126   inline static void reset_objects(field< basic_colvec<eT> >& x);
00127
